title: US tariffs effects on magnificent seven stocks
text: U.S. tariffs on China from 2018 to 2025 have significantly affected domestic capital markets. Tariff announcements hit supply chain‚Äìdependent firms like Apple, Tesla, Amazon, and Nvidia the hardest. I gathered stock data using the ‚Äúquantmod‚Äù package in R from Yahoo Finance, covering the Magnificent Seven tech stocks from 2018 to 2025..
